title: A Pirate's Life for Me: Book Two
description: Life is heating up for the sexy gay pirates on this Caribbean island! Now that Lucas is committed to staying on the island and performing with the pirates, he begins preparations to join the show. But it’s not easy being Lucas. Besides dealing with anxieties over fitting in with an all gay crew, he struggles to understand his reactions to pirate captain Adam and his first mate, Tyler. The two men, who are lovers with a sizzling sex life, dominate Lucas’ thoughts and inspire unwanted feelings in him. To cope, he turns to his friend Ben, who is all too eager to initiate Lucas into the island pirate lifestyle. But is Ben enough to distract him? Lucas isn’t so sure. When a rival island gang threatens him, it’s Adam and Tyler who defend him, and whom Lucas turns to for comfort.
